entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon then rain. Local amount 2 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High 10. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
